[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” css=”.vc_custom_1715928183708{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”contactform”][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class=”dft-spacer2″ css=”.vc_custom_1715935325182{background-image: url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/contact-form-bg-2.png?id=1139) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Contact Us

We look forward to hearing from you!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbrdrbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbrdrbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

    Sales & Support

    Our friendly team is here to help.

    Sales:
    business@dreamstechnologies.com

    Human Resources:
    hr@dreamstechnologies.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbrdrbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

    Contact

    If you have any questions or queries?
    Get in touch!

    UK Sales: +44-7438823475
    India Sales: +91 9600008844
    Human Resources: +91 9940770346[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbrdrbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

    Location

    UK: City Business Centre, 11a Lower Rd,
    London SE16 2XB.

    India: 22, Sri Kanchi Nagar, Cheranmanagar, Coimbatore, India – 641035.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”greybg”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”alth3″ width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

    Work with us

    Have you decided to work on a project with us?

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Thank you for your interest in our software building services! If you have any questions or would like to get in touch with us, please feel free to contact us using the form at any time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”maptp”][vc_column][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
